item.title: Adding dbt to your Fivetran pipeline
item.description: Money ball - Sabermetrics, you too can analyze dataâ€¦ I wanted to write a blog to demonstrate the power of integrating dbt within Fivetran to load data into Snowflake. So, I thought about what data is freely available and decided that rather than one more analysis of pandemic data I’d prefer to focus on the upcoming baseball season. Fig 1: Our Pipeline Software Stack Assumptions for running this tutorial
